        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">ABC fours game</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ABC fours Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de fours de ABC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo dos fours do ABC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco dei fours di ABC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Fours παιχνίδι ABC</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juego de los fours del ABC</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">reading fours game which teaches the learners to read especially with : the ea oo ee y etc</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ABC</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning to read</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading game</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ablesen fours Spiel, dem die Anfänger 
unterrichtet, zu lesen besonders mit: das EA oo ee y usw.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lisant le jeu de fours avec lequel enseigne les 
étudiants à lire particulièrement : l'ee y etc.. d'oo d'ea</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lendo o jogo dos fours que ensina os learners ler 
especial com: o ee y etc. do oo do ea</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">leggendo il gioco dei fours cui insegna i 
principianti leggere particolarmente con: il ee y ecc di oo di 
ea</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαβάζοντας fours το παιχνίδι που διδάσκει τους 
αρχαρίους για να διαβάσει ειδικά με: ea oo EE Υ 
κ.λπ...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">leyendo el juego de los fours con el cual enseña a
principiantes a leer especialmente: el ee y etc del oo del ea</string>
          </description>
